label.welcomeMsg: Citi Payment Exchange has begun offering a free service that will allow you to receive your payments electronically! Setup your profile on our new Electronic Payment Processing System so we can begin processing your payments. Payment Exchange lets you:

label.trackPayment: Track all of your payments in one place
